bwwExcerpt: When Sean Hayes as the concert pianist and celebrated wit Oscar Levant sits down at the piano to play 'Rhapsody in Blue,' I thought at first that it was a recording and he was simulating the recital. But no, Hayes was himself a concert pianist before he was an actor, and his beautiful live rendition of Gershwin’s beloved jazz piano concerto is without question the highlight of 'Good Night, Oscar,' which is opening tonight at Broadway’s Belasco Theater.
